short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grow on LinkedIn with the most productive way to create content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension comes with the Bright web app and allows you to:

1. Add mentions (tagging others)
2. Finalize attachments (image / video / PDF)
3. Schedule with LinkedIn native or post directly

Other things you can do in the editor on top of LinkedIn:

✓ Have a clean space to write & save your ideas and drafts
✓ Have a post preview across desktop, mobile and tablet
✓ Use 750+ templates of hooks, structures, endings & CTAs
✓ Use side notes for guidance or a place to put materials

-----

Bright is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with LinkedIn Corporation, its parent company, or subsidiary companies, registered in the US or any other countries.
